Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25858 affecting package uglify-js for versions less than 3.19.3-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-25858 affecting package uglify-js for versions less than 3.19.3-11. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package uglify-js is earlier than 3.19.3-11, affected by CVE-2022-25858
